titleStmt.title: Verses on the blessed and happy coronation of Charles the II. King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faity, printed at the hearty desires of persons of quality.
titleStmt.author: Rich, John, fl. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and are to be sold by John Ratkliffe bookseller in Plymouth,

notesStmt.note: Text begins on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
